title: Introduction to this Session
text: Read thoughtfully these passages about sin. Try to become a character in the Genesis stories. Imagine yourself in the garden of Eden, on Noah’s ark, or helping to build the tower of Babel. Notice that in Jeremiah the prophet grieves over the sins of a whole society. In 2 Samuel the prophet Nathan throws a blinding spotlight on David’s sin. Psalm 51 is a confession of sin that could be your own.
